remarks: The negative of a scalar of the dual of a vector space.  (Contributed by NM, 26-Feb-2015.)
statement:
ldualneg.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
ldualneg.m $e |- M = ( invg ` R ) $.
ldualneg.d $e |- D = ( LDual ` W ) $.
ldualneg.s $e |- S = ( Scalar ` D ) $.
ldualneg.n $e |- N = ( invg ` S ) $.
ldualneg.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) $.
ldualneg $p |- ( ph -> N = M ) $.
